mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yule VALUES ( #{id}, #{cjsj}, #{xm}, #{zjhm}, #{zz}, #{xb}, #{mz}, #{csrq}, #{zjlx}, #{jg}, #{type}, #{cydz}, #{last_rzsj}, #{last_lgmc}, #{last_lgbm}, #{last_fh}, #{count}, #{message} )ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cjsj=values(cjsj), zz=VALUES (zz), count=values(count), cydz=VALUES (cydz), last_rzsj=VALUES(last_rzsj), last_lgmc=VALUES (last_lgmc), last_lgbm=VALUES (last_lgbm), last_fh=VALUES (last_fh)
mapper.select: select count(1) FROM yule where last_rzsj BETWEEN SUBDATE(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL 6 month) and SYSDATE() and zjhm=#{zjhm}
select zjhm,count(1) as count FROM yule where last_rzsj BETWEEN SUBDATE(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL ${param1} month) and SYSDATE() group by zjhm
select zjhm FROM yule where last_rzsj BETWEEN SUBDATE(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL #{param1} month) and SYSDATE() group by zjhm
select zjhm FROM yule where last_rzsj BETWEEN SUBDATE(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL #{param1} hour) and SYSDATE() group by zjhm
